    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public boolean contains(E source,
                        E target)
        Checks if there is a direct or indirect dependency from source to target.
        Parameters:
        source - the source
        target - the target
        Returns:
        true if there is a direct or indirect dependency from source to target; false if there is none.

      • containsAll

        public boolean containsAll(E source,
                           Collection<? extends E> targets)
        Checks if given source is dependent on all of specified targets.
        Parameters:
        source - the source
        targets - the targets
        Returns:
        true if source is dependent on all of targets; false if there is no dependency from source to any of targets at all

      • containsAll

        public boolean containsAll(E source,
                           E... targets)
        Check if given source is dependent on all of specified targets.
        Parameters:
        source - the source
        targets - the targets
        Returns:
        true if source is dependent on all of targets; false otherwise
        See Also:
        containsAll(java.lang.Object, java.util.Collection)

      • getAvailablePaths

        public List<List<E>> getAvailablePaths(E source,
                                       E target)
        Finds all direct or indirect dependency paths from given source to specified target. Note that the first element in each list is always the specified source.
        Parameters:
        source - the source
        target - the target
        Returns:
        a list of possible direct or indirect dependency paths from source to target; possibly empty.

      • getSingleGroup

        public List<E> getSingleGroup()
        Returns a list of all elements in order.
        Returns:
        a list of all elements in order.

      • getHorizontalGroups

        public List<List<E>> getHorizontalGroups()
        Returns a list of horizontal dependency groups. Each group in the list can be processed concurrently but all elements in a group must be processed in order.
        Returns:
        a list of horizontal groups

      • getVerticalGroups

        public List<List<E>> getVerticalGroups()
        Returns a list of vertical dependency groups. Each element in a group can be processed concurrently but all groups in the list must be processed in order.
        Returns:
        a list of vertical groups

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears this instance.
